message.body: So I was talking to Chloe about Taco Bell, and we were debating chalupas and gorditas... Which one would you say is definitively better, if you had to choose?
I cant say that either is definitively better, but I can say that I would almost always choose the cheesy gorita crunch over both.
Score. That's the best answer I've heard yet.
Well, I'm glad you think so, because to me it felt like a cop-out from a very serious and earnest question.
Haha. Only if you believe fast food menus are an issue that today's society needs to address with more vivacity.

I keep thinking about some profundity that must surely be contained in this matter. Then I keep forgetting and doing something else. I'd be inclined to distrust anyone who answered as I did. Did you or chloe have pinions?
